description: adb is a command-line tool that lets you communicate with a device.

root.name: connect
tip: connect to a device via TCP/IP [default port=5555]

root.name: devices
tip: list connected devices (-l for long output)

root.name: disable-verity
tip: disable dm-verity checking on userdebug builds

root.name: disconnect
tip: disconnect from given TCP/IP device [default port=5555], or all

root.name: enable-verity
tip: re-enable dm-verity checking on userdebug builds

root.name: install
tip: push a single package to the device and install it

root.name: install-multi-package
tip: push one or more packages to the device and install them atomically

root.name: install-multiple
tip: push multiple APKs to the device for a single package and install them

root.name: jdwp
tip: list pids of processes hosting a JDWP transport

root.name: keygen
tip: generate adb public/private key; private key stored in FILE,

root.name: kill-server
tip: kill the server if it is running

root.name: reboot
tip: reboot the device; defaults to booting system image but

root.name: reconnect
tip: kick connection from host side to force reconnect

options.name: -R
tip: used to remount the system partition as read-only after it has been remounted as read-write.

options.name: --list
tip: list all reverse socket connections from device

options.name: --remove-all
tip: remove all reverse socket connections from device

root.name: shell
tip: run remote shell command (interactive shell if no command given)

root.name: sideload
tip: sideload the given full OTA package

root.name: start-server
tip: ensure that there is a server running

root.name: sync
tip: sync a local build from $ANDROID_PRODUCT_OUT to the device (default all)

root.name: tcpip
tip: restart adbd listening on TCP on PORT

root.name: uninstall
tip: remove this app package from the device

options.name: -k
tip: keep the data and cache directories

root.name: wait-for-bootloader
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-device
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-disconnect
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-local-bootloader
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-local-device
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-local-disconnect
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-local-recovery
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-local-rescue
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-local-sideload
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-recovery
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-rescue
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-sideload
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-usb-bootloader
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-usb-device
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-usb-disconnect
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-usb-recovery
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-usb-rescue
tip: wait for device to be in the given state

root.name: wait-for-usb-sideload
tip: wait for device to be in the given state
